short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Move to next tab when you click on the `ack-btn` buttons, only used on international-permit.com internal website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
International Automobile Association Next Tab on Click extension

An extension used to move to the next tab in International Automobile Association web dashboard, for International Automobile Association's internal use only (staffs).

Instructions for usage:

1. Navigate to the International Automobile Association dashbaord, with all the process tabs opened.
2. Ensure that the extension is enabled and has access you the site.
3. Click on the any button has `ack-btn` class.
4. You will be moved to the next tab for next process.
5. Enjoy the the working day!
